titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt transportation on certain ferries from the excise tax on transportation of passengers by water.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1016)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the excise tax on transportation of passengers by water a ferry voyage of less than 12 hours between a port in the United States and a port outside the United States.
